long_desc.thetext:
We did the first step of internationalizing the BPMN modeler messages.
We need to create the fragments to host the nl1 properties.
I will work on this, targeting for end of Q1 2008.
Fixed, it is now part of the Babel project. We need to motivate translators now :).

(In reply to comment #0) > We did the first step of internationalizing the BPMN modeler messages. > > We need to create the fragments to host the nl1 properties. > > I will work on this, targeting for end of Q1 2008. >
Hi, I made a french translation for BPMN, but it's not a fragment. Maybe I can send your all the resources files? I need to convert my work to a fragment. Currently, french resources are packaged directly in the plugin.

(In reply to comment #2) > (In reply to comment #0) > > We did the first step of internationalizing the BPMN modeler messages. > > > > We need to create the fragments to host the nl1 properties. > > > > I will work on this, targeting for end of Q1 2008. > > > > Hi, I made a french translation for BPMN, but it's not a fragment. Maybe I can > send your all the resources files? I need to convert my work to a fragment. > Currently, french resources are packaged directly in the plugin. >
Devantor, can you open a new bug and attach the properties files there (I can recreate the fragment from them if needed)? I will see with Denis Roy how we can have them imported in Babel then.
Thanks!
